function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of population characteristics and their impact on COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Understanding the factors that contribute to COVID-19 spread","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions based on population characteristics","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in COVID-19 cases and affected countries during the study period","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus and increased cases","Mitigation":"Implement strict public health measures, travel restrictions, and testing protocols","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, testing equipment, public health policies","People":"Global population, public health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Use of quantile regression to analyze the impact of globalisation and population characteristics on COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Revealing statistical relationships at different quantiles of the distribution","Mitigation":"Enhance understanding of non-linear relationships between variables and their impact on disease spread","Technologies":"Data analysis and regression modeling tools","People":"Statisticians, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical agencies"}]}
